title: Statistics Canada Open Licence
description: Subject to this licence, Statistics Canada grants you a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive licence to: use, reproduce, publish, freely distribute, or sell the Information; use, reproduce, publish, freely distribute, or sell Value-added Products; and, sublicence any or all such rights, under terms consistent with this licence.

description_translated.en: Subject to this licence, Statistics Canada grants you a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive licence to: use, reproduce, publish, freely distribute, or sell the Information; use, reproduce, publish, freely distribute, or sell Value-added Products; and, sublicence any or all such rights, under terms consistent with this licence.
description_translated.fr: Sous réserve des conditions de la présente licence, Statistique Canada vous accorde une licence mondiale, libre de redevances et non exclusive vous permettant : d'utiliser, de reproduire, de publier, de diffuser gratuitement ou de vendre l'information ; d'utiliser, de reproduire, de publier, de diffuser gratuitement ou de vendre des produits à valeur ajoutée ; d'accorder des sous licences conférant une partie ou la totalité de ces droits, conformément aux conditions de cette licence.

title: Crown Land Use Policy Atlas Terms of Use

title_translated.en: Crown Land Use Policy Atlas Terms of Use
title_translated.fr: Atlas et politiques d’aménagement des terres de la Couronne modalités d’utilisation

description: This website was created by the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (the ministry). Use of this site and any of the data, text, maps and other information on the site (collectively "content") is governed by the terms and conditions set out below ("Terms of Use"). Use of the site implies acceptance of these terms.

description_translated.en: This website was created by the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources (the ministry). Use of this site and any of the data, text, maps and other information on the site (collectively "content") is governed by the terms and conditions set out below ("Terms of Use"). Use of the site implies acceptance of these terms.
description_translated.fr: Le présent site Web a été mis sur pied par le ministère des Richesses naturelles de l’Ontario (le ministère). L’utilisation de ce site et de toute partie de ses données, de ses textes, de ses cartes et de toute autre information que contient le site (collectivement appelés « contenu ») est régie par les modalités stipulées ci-dessous (« modalités d’utilisation »). En utilisant le présent site, vous en acceptez les modalités d’utilisation.

title: Ontario Geospatial Data Exchange
description: An Organization which is eligible for OGDE membership and wishes to become an OGDE member must complete and sign the OGDE Membership Application Form and submit it to the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry (OMNRF) for acceptance. By completing and signing that Form and submitting it to OMNRF, the Organization (“Member”) applies for OGDE membership and accepts and agrees to be bound by and comply with these OGDE Membership Terms and Conditions, as amended from time to time, referred to in the Membership Application Form if its application is accepted.

description_translated.en: An Organization which is eligible for OGDE membership and wishes to become an OGDE member must complete and sign the OGDE Membership Application Form and submit it to the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry (OMNRF) for acceptance. By completing and signing that Form and submitting it to OMNRF, the Organization (“Member”) applies for OGDE membership and accepts and agrees to be bound by and comply with these OGDE Membership Terms and Conditions, as amended from time to time, referred to in the Membership Application Form if its application is accepted.
description_translated.fr: An Organization which is eligible for OGDE membership and wishes to become an OGDE member must complete and sign the OGDE Membership Application Form and submit it to the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry (OMNRF) for acceptance. By completing and signing that Form and submitting it to OMNRF, the Organization (“Member”) applies for OGDE membership and accepts and agrees to be bound by and comply with these OGDE Membership Terms and Conditions, as amended from time to time, referred to in the Membership Application Form if its application is accepted.

title: Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry Electronic Intellectual Property End-User Licence Agreement

description: The Licensor grants to the Licensee a non-transferable, non-exclusive, limited-use licence for the EIP. TheLicensee may use and make copies of the EIP for its professional or non-commercial end-use only. The Licensee is required to display the following text on all reproductions of the EIP: Produced by (insert Licensee’s name here) under Licence with the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources and Forestry© Queen’s Printer for Ontario, 20** (** insert year of publication of EIP).

title: The Natural Heritage Information Centre
description:
To access sensitive or detailed data on biodiversity, you will need a Sensitive Data Use Licence. To get a licence, you must:
 - demonstrate a legitimate need to know 
 - complete data sensitivity training 

 Email the Natural Heritage Information Centre or phone us at 705-755-2159 to inquire about a Sensitive Data Use Licence.

description_translated.en:
To access sensitive or detailed data on biodiversity, you will need a Sensitive Data Use Licence. To get a licence, you must:
 - demonstrate a legitimate need to know 
 - complete data sensitivity training 

 Email the Natural Heritage Information Centre or phone us at 705-755-2159 to inquire about a Sensitive Data Use Licence.
description_translated.fr:
Pour pouvoir consulter des données sensibles ou détaillées en matière de biodiversité, vous devrez vous procurer une convention de droits d’utilisation de données sensibles. Pour l'obtenir, vous devez :
 - démontrer que vous avez un besoin légitime d'avoir accès à ces données 
 - suivre la formation sur la sensibilité des données 

 Veuillez envoyer un courriel au Centre d'information sur le patrimoine naturel ou communiquer avec nous par téléphone au numéro 705 755-2159 pour demander une convention de droits d'utilisation de données sensibles.

title: Apache License 2.0
description: Apache 2.0 is a free and open license without “copyleft”. This authorizes the use, modification and possibly redistribution of the source code of these projects under any other license, but requires recognition from the ASF and the inclusion of the text of the license, and prohibits the use of trademarks of the ASF.

description_translated.en: Apache 2.0 is a free and open license without “copyleft”. This authorizes the use, modification and possibly redistribution of the source code of these projects under any other license, but requires recognition from the ASF and the inclusion of the text of the license, and prohibits the use of trademarks of the ASF.
description_translated.fr: Apache 2.0 est une licence libre et ouverte sans « copyleft ». Celle-ci autorise l'utilisation, la modification et éventuellement la redistribution du code source de ces projets sous toute autre licence, mais requiert une reconnaissance de l'ASF (Apache Software Foundation) et l'inclusion du texte de la licence, et interdit l'utilisation des marques de commerce de l'ASF.
